content.question: The 1860 cartoon above illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: Garibaldi presenting liberated Italian territory to Victor Emmanuel
Garibaldi replacing Cavour as Victor Emmanuel's principal adviser
Garibaldi asking for more ammunition from Victor Emmanuel to help free southern Italy
Napoleon III' s military support for Garibaldi
The complete unification of Italy, including Rome

content.answer: Garibaldi presenting liberated Italian territory to Victor Emmanuel

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
